title: Klaus Dieter Neubert found guilty of 2015 killing of wife Olga in Hobart - ABC News (Australian Broadcasting Corporation)
text:
Klaus Dieter Neubert found guilty of 2015 killing of wife Olga in Hobart Posted February 15, 2017 13:32:08 
A Hobart jury has found Klaus Dieter Neubert, 74, guilty of the shooting murder of his estranged wife Olga, 37, in a Hobart street in 2015. 
More to come.
